entry.title: Fast Drying Top Coat
entry.summary:
Vendor: treat collection
Type: nail polish
Price: 18.00

Durable and glossy coating, seals color quickly for less dry time

Formulated without Toluene, DBP, Camphor, Formaldehyde or Formaldehyde Resin.

Treat collection's fast drying top coat dries up to four coats of nail polish to a high gloss shine in less than five minutes. When applied, it hides any imperfections in the application of nail polish. It also contains a UV inhibitor which prevents nail polish from yellowing and fading.

Apply 60 seconds after last color application, allow five minutes to dry.

• Made in the USA

• Cruelty free

• Suitable for vegans

• 15 ml

Ingredients

Butyl Acetate, Ethyl Acetate, Cellulose Acetate Butyrate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Adipic Acid/Neopentyl Glycol/Trimellitic Anhydride Copolymer, Etocrylene, Trimethyl Pentanyl Diisobutyrate, Triphenyl Phosphate, Acrylates Copolymer, CI 60725

Directions

Apply 60 seconds after last color application, allow five minutes to dry.
